item.title: RuneCrafting
item.dc:creator: @alexahnon alexahnon
item.description:
@alexahnon wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:24, topic:307392”][quote author=alexahnon link=topic=403545.msg3078418#msg3078418 date=1262005170]
Hey. First of all, I would like to say that this is a great tutorial and a great way of making RuneCrafting.
But I got bit of a problem if you want to help me.

I can’t find the

int objectY = p.inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

In any of my files and was wondering, where should I add it then?
I am using Emulous btw.
[/quote]

Try:

int objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

In your Client.java file.[/quote]

Didn’t find that either, I tried searching int objectY alone but didn’t find that either at all. Do you think I miss it? If so, I would like to have the code or know how to add the “int objectY = p.inStream.readUnsignedWordA();” to my server.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneCrafting
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“alexahnon, post:23, topic:307392”]Hey. First of all, I would like to say that this is a great tutorial and a great way of making RuneCrafting.
But I got bit of a problem if you want to help me.

I can’t find the

int objectY = p.inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

In any of my files and was wondering, where should I add it then?
I am using Emulous btw.[/quote]

Try:

int objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

In your Client.java file.

Read full topic
